issue.title: [JS] Remove hard-coded Field.nullable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5689](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5689). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Context: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4502#discussion_r296390833

This isn't a huge issue since we can just elide validity buffers when null count is zero, but sometimes it's desirable to be able to assert a Field is _never_ null.
